attributes.action: Stop the discrepincy in pay structures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all should be paid the same wage. Why should our so called bosses be paid a wage more than us, what makes them so different to what they do as to the workers who actually enables them to have a job. ONE WAGE FOR ALL

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
